movies.title: Victor et le manoir aux secrets
movies.plot: When Victor and his family move into his grand-uncle's mysterious - and seemingly haunted - mansion, the young boy detective makes it his mission to solve the case of a girl who died there forty years earlier.
movies.simplePlot: When Victor and his family move into his grand-uncle's mysterious - and seemingly haunted - mansion, the young boy detective makes it his mission to solve the case of a girl who died there forty years earlier.

biography.bio: Kristo Ferkic was born on August 17, 1998. He is an actor, known for Victor et le manoir aux secrets (2012), Die Schneekönigin (2014) and Le Club des 5 en péril (2013).
biography.name: Kristo Ferkic

biography.bio: Joanna Ferkic was born in 1994 in Heist, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. She is an actress, known for Victor et le manoir aux secrets (2012), Der Seehund von Sanderoog (2006) and Willkommen im Club (2013).
biography.name: Joanna Ferkic

biography.bio: Vijessna Ferkic was born and raised in a small town near Hamburg, Germany. At the age of ten she was accepted into one of the first and more prestigious acting schools in Hamburg. Shortly after that Ferkic was chosen to star in the series "Die Pfefferkörner" (1998-2001). Ferkic subsequently had several guest roles on established television series and movie productions. In 2008, Ferkic was chosen to play Sophie in the movie "The Reader".
biography.name: Vijessna Ferkic

biography.bio: Christoph Maria Herbst was born on February 9, 1966 in Wuppertal, Germany. He is an actor, known for Stromberg (2004), Stromberg - Der Film (2014) and Il est de retour (2015). He has been married to Gisi Herbst since 2012.
biography.name: Christoph Maria Herbst

biography.bio: Gudrun Ritter was born on November 16, 1936 in Marienberg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Hanna (2011), Boxhagener Platz (2010) and Antibodies (2005).
biography.name: Gudrun Ritter

biography.bio: Waldemar Kobus was born in 1966 in Szczytno, Warminsko-Mazurskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Black Book (2006), Valkyrie (2008) and Vic le Viking (2009). He is married to Traute Hoess.
biography.name: Waldemar Kobus

biography.bio: Elena Oechsner is an actress, known for Victor et le manoir aux secrets (2012).
biography.name: Elena Oechsner

biography.bio: Uwe Friedrichsen was born on May 27, 1934 in Altona (now Hamburg), Germany. He was an actor, known for John Klings Abenteuer (1965), Schwarz Rot Gold (1982) and Der kleine Dachschaden (1998). He was married to Ute Papst and Nathalie Emery. He died on April 30, 2016 in Hamburg, Germany.
biography.name: Uwe Friedrichsen

biography.bio: Susanne Berckhemer was born on March 20, 1978 in Augsburg, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress, known for Julia - Wege zum Glück (2005), Tessa - Leben für die Liebe (2006) and Victor et le manoir aux secrets (2012).
biography.name: Susanne Berckhemer

biography.bio: Dieter Schaad was born on April 2, 1926 in Wiesbaden, Hesse, Germany. He is an actor, known for Le jour de la libération (2003), Die Akte General (2016) and Verzweiflung (2000). He is married to Dagmar Hessenland.
biography.name: Dieter Schaad

biography.bio: Peter Lerchbaumer was born on March 2, 1945 in Vienna, Austria. He is an actor, known for Tatort (1970), Der Mann auf der Brücke (2009) and Der Tod ist kein Beweis (2002).
biography.name: Peter Lerchbaumer

biography.bio: Christian Furrer was born in 1977. He is an actor, known for Le labyrinthe du silence (2014), Im Winter, so schön (2015) and Victor et le manoir aux secrets (2012).
biography.name: Christian Furrer

biography.bio: Matthias Müsse was born on November 16, 1966 in Düsseldorf, Germany. He is a production designer and actor, known for Un prof pas comme les autres (2013), Before the Fall (2004) and Der Wixxer (2004).
biography.name: Matthias Müsse

biography.bio: Justus Winker is an actor, known for Victor et le manoir aux secrets (2012).
biography.name: Justus Winker

biography.bio: Maximilian Kern is an actor, known for Victor et le manoir aux secrets (2012).
biography.name: Maximilian Kern

filmingLocations.location: Villa Meister, Allesinastreet 1-3, 65931 Frankfurt am Main, Germany

categories.category: Outstanding Children or Youth Film (Bester Kinder- und Jugendfilm)
